amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the EPA from using the "social cost of carbon" valuation for any energy-related rule that costs more than $1 billion unless and until a Federal law is enacted authorizing such use.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (PA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 178 (Roll no. 430).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Murphy (PA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (PA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 178 (Roll no. 430).
